channel.title: How to use Virtual PC properly?
channel.description:
Sorry if this is this is in the wrong section but i need to ask something...
after you install virtual PC, and you get the internet working and all. I noticed that runescape lags terribly. How do you raise the amount of [b]Video RAM[/b] for your virtual PC? mine is always set to 8mb only. 8 MB!!! thats horrible!

item.title: How to use Virtual PC properly?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

This should be in questions. Why do people keep posting in the Tutorials section? lol

Read full topic
item.source: How to use Virtual PC properly?

item.title: How to use Virtual PC properly?
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Microsoft Virtual PC 2004 is a program developed by microsoft to simulate an entire pc within the program, you can create these virtual pc’s and install an os on them to use afterwards, pretty nifty, especially to test new stuff, like programs or os’es.

And, maybe try the settings? turn of the virtual pc and in the manu use the pc’s propertys, then put in the ram u want to spend on it

Read full topic
item.source: How to use Virtual PC properly?
